abstract: As the Cardinals marched to the World Series, Albert Pujols had something truly rare for him: help from his teammates.
snippet: As the Cardinals marched to the World Series, Albert Pujols had something truly rare for him: help from his teammates.
lead_paragraph: It is no secret that Albert Pujols is a great player, possibly one of the best ever. But as the Cardinals marched to the World Series, Pujols had something truly rare for him: help from his teammates.

headline.main: Rare Parity in the St. Louis Lineup
